title: CapEx Operations Program Manager
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, our creative ideas have a way of becoming wonderful products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish.
description: Drive day-to-day activities to meet overall program objectives. Facilitate good communication and collaboration across engineering functions, operations, and vendors. Works together with several teams for budget planning, engineering design, BOM building, CTB, setup, vendor support, sustaining, transfer, EOL scrap etc. Drive CM teams - for on-site equipment management, including quantity, status monitoring etc; for equipment repair, calibration, spare parts management etc; to maintain high traceability and usability of Apple’s assets. Involve tactical coordination (scope, schedule & resource management) of multiple concurrent projects in a matrix environment, across multiple sites through the entire asset lifecycle.
key_qualifications: Experience in other complicate capital equipment management environment could be a plus, such as semiconductor, LED, solar, military, aerospace, automotive, large agricultural machinery, etc. LEAN master with lean implementation and organizational change experience; Proficiency using Microsoft Project Or OmniPlan at the enterprise level. Proficiency using Excel, Keynote, PPT, Word etc. Excellent communication, partner management, negotiating and influencing skills; Deep understanding of economic metrics such as NPV, return on investment, etc, and their application to program management; PMP certification desirable. Demonstration of equivalent knowledge is required if not certified. Experience in leading different contract manufacturing and suppliers with different scales; Ability to work with rapid development cycles and to remains flexible and calm in the face of ambiguity; Detailed knowledge of product development processes as well as manufacturing processes.
education_experience: Bachelor's Degree in a technical field with at least 5 years of program management experience.
